mods.abstract: The first synthesis of 2,3,6,7-tetrabromoanthracene is presented, starting from benzene in a straightforward four step synthesis.

bibliographicCitation.apa_indent: Schaefer, C., Herrmann, F., & Mattay, J. (2008). Synthesis of 2,3,6,7-tetrabromoanthracene. BEILSTEIN JOURNAL OF ORGANIC CHEMISTRY, 4.
